named-query.name: Minutedata.listByScripid
named-query.query: SELECT m FROM Minutedata m WHERE m.minutedataPK.scripid = :scripid

named-query.name: Minutedata.listByScripidLastupdate
named-query.query: SELECT m FROM Minutedata m WHERE m.minutedataPK.scripid = :scripid and m.minutedataPK.lastupdateminute > :lastupdatedate

named-query.name: Calltable.calllistSorted
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM Calltable c ORDER BY c.calltablePK.scripid, c.calltablePK.lastupdateminute

named-query.name: Calltable.callPerScripid
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM Calltable c WHERE c.calltablePK.scripid = :scripid

named-query.name: Calltable.getReverseCalls
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM Calltable c WHERE c.calltablePK.scripid = :scripid AND c.calltablePK.lastupdateminute < :lastupdatedate AND c.calltwo = :callString
